attributes.action: Abolish road tax for motor cycles which are owned and riden by people who pay car tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The cost of VED for both a car and mid sized motorcycle can easily exceed £250 per annum, when many of these machines are for pleasure only these costs can become unreasonable. It is unfair to require car owners who have a motorcycle to pay road tax on a motorcycle after they have already paid it on there car. When it is only feasible to use one vehicle at a time, it cannot be justified that an individual is required to pay twice.
